UploadFileAsync(String, String)

Upload a file that contains document(s) to be used across various endpoints/features. Currently, the size of all the files uploaded by one organization can be up to 1 GB. Please contact OpenAI if you need to increase the storage limit

Declaration
Task<File> UploadFileAsync(string filePath, string purpose = "fine-tune")
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.String filePath

The name of the file to use for this request
System.String purpose

The intendend purpose of the uploaded documents. Use "fine-tune" for Fine-tuning. This allows us to validate the format of the uploaded file.
Returns
Type Description
System.Threading.Tasks.Task<File>
